title: philipma1957
author: philipma1957
created_time: September 23, 2022, 12:57:14 PMLast edit: September 24, 2022, 12:07:38 AM by philipma1957
content: So gold shell has a 1620 hash at 1450 watt miner available.https://www.goldshell.com/ltlite/it is not in the league of the bitmain L7 I have a few of them and they do about 9200 hash at 3400 watts.but the goldshell would earn say $1.20 in LTC and maybe $3.60 in doge say $4.80(edit typo) while burning around 36 kwatts which is $3.60 at 10 centsthat is a $1.20 net with 10 cent power. I have much cheaper power. more like 5 cents so4.80-1.80= 3 a day profithttps://www.newegg.com/p/3GG-0002-00059?Item=9SIB7S8J012844reseller wants way too much $2,248 this is a 750 day payback.I can not seem to find it at a correct price. Under 1500 would mean a 500 day payback  I wonder if anyone has a source for these at a lower price.

Under 1500 would mean a 500 day payback  I wonder if anyone has a source for these at a lower price.I agree with you about the resellers however they are also considering persons who buy the devices to mine coins and hold them for the future and hence that is why the high price they ask,also where I live is the same all over the place,people want a lot of money for such devices they even want 1000 EUR for a L3+ because they think that the Scrypt algorithm will be one of the best to mine for the time being.I personally would never buy the miner you say at the price you refer it here.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: I think this was around $2000 or so. It was more popular in the days when Elon was pumping Doge.Right now I think who ever wants to sell it is mining with it and waiting to find someone to spend >$2000 on this miner. Who knows. Maybe some GPU miner will buy it since it can yield a profit compared to GPU mining. Usually there is always someone crazy to pay these prices for a ASIC.

Usually there is always someone crazy to pay these prices for a ASIC.this one came out July this year it was not around when doge was at 50-70 centsAs for having 1 million doge our four team partner ship had 2 million doge.We cashed too much too soonWe then held the rest too long.Still our 2 million doge was acquired for about 0.002 cents or 4000we did make good money on it close to 100k and we have about 400000 leftbut 2 million x 70 cents = 1.4 million usdso 100 k vs 1.4 million is tough to look at.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: We all sold doge way too early. I remember I bought a bunch at like 20 sats because if you load DogeBTC on Poloniex you will see that whenever doge hits 15-25 sat area it always has a crazy rally. Poloniex chart is the only one that shows this because it’s like the oldest exchange for doge.Anyways so I bought a bunch at 20 sats and set some limit orders at 50 sats and 99 sats and would just forget about it. Well shortly after I got that fill at 20 sats Elon started to pump it and it immediately filed at both limit sells.Then it went to like 1000 sats along with BTC pumping and I sold long ago. Not the only one feeling like an idiot.
